XIII.ii.3.A.1.b
.
When Certification May Be Required for Preference for Public Housing
A public housing authority may require Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) certification if the established criteria allow preference to Veterans or their dependents because of service-connected (SC) disability or death.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Certificate of Preference for Public Housing
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
